author: tokey1475
content: is this because your priority fee is too low, or because blocks moved above your max fee and then came back down?  I look at a high priority fee as more necessary to buy inclusion at the the current base fee quickly.  If you are willing to "gamble" on max fee a prio fee of 1 and a higher max fee will also get you included very quickly in my experience

author: .vbuterin
content: Oh I definitely also set the basefee up 100gwei higher than the recommended amount

author: .vbuterin
content: I think realistically it's some of both

author: .vbuterin
content: sometimes prio fee issues, sometimes base fee goes too high

author: tokey1475
content: to <@!301186049323958275> 's point it will be interesting to see how this plays out in PoS if we get dominant block builders.  Will they not have the power to push the min required priority fee up quite a bit?
